update tb_svc_coupon
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
BRAND_ID = #{record.brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STORE_ID = #{record.storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IS_DEFAULT = #{record.isDefault,jdbcType=BIT},
COUPON_TP = #{record.couponTp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DISCOUNT_TP = #{record.discountTp,jdbcType=CHAR},

MAX_CNT = #{record.maxCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ISSUE_CNT = #{record.issueCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},

`BEGIN` = #{record.begin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

DISCOUNT_LIMIT = #{record.discountLimit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

UPDATED = #{record.updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STORE_IDS = #{record.storeIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
NOTICE = #{record.notice,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
